posts.post_title: 150 Brand New Tobacco Toploaders Plus Sleeves
posts.post_content: Fifteen packs of ten each, brand new and unopened Tobacco sized Top Loaders and sleeves.  Total of 150 top loaders and sleeves.  $70 delivered and can ship same day.  Thank you.
